hackathon-description-text: The Horizons Hackathon is a chance to take the new skills you have learned as a developer and to build something with it in 24 hours.
hackathon-rules: We will enforce the Hack Code of Conduct

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Dinner with Darwish and your whole team! (up to $30/person)
Dinner with Darwish and your whole team! (up to $30/person)
Dinner with Darwish and your whole team! (up to $30/person)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4040 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19104, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What type of technical challenges did the group deal with? How technically did they dive here?
How unique and innovative is the demo? Is it new and original or a combination of existing services?
How good is the visual design and interaction experience?

hackathon-description-header: A hackathon for the students of the Horizons Bootcamp. Build something in 24 hours with the skills you've learned over the past 6 weeks!
